name: Christopher_Knight_Home_Bayer_Tufted_Fabric_Bench_Ottoman
reviews: A great window seat for the price. Comfortable and very easy to assemble. Overall, I am pleased with the purchase.
You can not go wrong with this bench. Looks exactly like in the photo. It is very sturdy and super easy to assemble (it took me five minutes). Very happy with this purchase!
Very nice. Simple design. Reminiscent of Frank Loyd Wright furniture designed for his houses. Amazing value
This bench is gorgeous! It shipped very quickly, and only took 5 minutes to assemble. Love it!
GREAT PRODUCT,GREAT SHIPPING GREAT COMPANY,THANKS OVERSTOCK
great piece for the foyer. Now hubby has a place to sit and put on his sneakers.
Fast delivery good quality , fits the description
Love the look of this bench. This works perfect with contemporary, traditional, or transitional setting. Love it!
this bench is perfect for our entryway but comfortable enough to use as extra seating for a dinner party. fast shipping and easy assembly too.

I recently purchased this ottoman and am very pleased with its appearance. The tufted fabric adds a nice touch. I was really easy to assemble .. the legs are already attached by a hinge and only require some screws. Very pleased with the purchase.

We recently bought a bedroom set with very similar lines & color of wood. I felt this would go nicely at the foot of our bed to put our comforter on at night, to sit on when putting on shoes, etc. It worked out perfectly & I am very happy with the piece, as well as the price. I would say it's very true to colors I viewed on my laptop. The tufted top is really nice too.
Great buy for a Christopher Knight bench! Thank you overstock, this went perfect for my entryway!
I don't love it, but it's easy to assemble and there were no suprises in appearance or quality. I wanted it at the foot of my bed but it's bigger than I thought and a bit too bulky.
description:
The Bayer tufted bench ottoman provides comfortable and convenient seating for your home. With its natural dark tones and tufted fabric seat, this ottoman complements any decor. 
Includes: One (1) bench ottomanMaterials: Fabric with a birch wood frameUpholstery color: Dark beigeFinish: BrownWeight: 25-poundsDimensions: 17 inches high x 20 inches wide x 46 inches longMaterialFabric, WoodBench TypeEntryway, Settees, Standard BenchesAssemblyAssembly RequiredColorBrown
